Yes, that is correct. We would get them set up with their own MBO account. We can even set it up so you are able to bill the client a higher rate than the negotiated rate with the consultant. The consultant will only see the rate you negotiated with him/her in their business center account with MBO. I will go into more detail on this if/when the situation arises or you can give me a ring if you want to dig deeper on this topic.
Keep the good questions coming! J
Sara
